overview:
With 25 years experience in Human Resources and Human Resource systems, Mr. Marsh is responsible for growing sales, managing the sales process and personnel, training, establishing vendor relationships, developing new sales channels, and providing product input.

Mr. Marshâ€™s extensive sales and sales management experience in Human Resource Management Systems is reflected in his previous employment as VP of Sales for InterAct, Inc.; Sales Manager, Internet Products at Webhire, Inc.; HRMS Sales Consultant at ADP; Sales Representative at Spectrum HR Systems Corporation; and, Software Instructor at Integral Systems, Inc.

Scottâ€™s educational background includes a diploma in International Business from Stichting Nijenrode, Breukelen, Holland and a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Business Administration with an emphasis in Management and Industrial Relations and Organizational Behavior from Temple University, Philadelphia, PA.
